snippet.title: Moondrop Trails Release Trailer
snippet.description: Moondrop is a roguelike farming game that takes place on a shapeshifting mountain. It spent a year in Early Access while I built in content for the four "elemental" mountain trails (sunny, shady, damp, and dry). This trailer shows off some of the new content and puzzles that the player can encounter on the different trails.
